did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University
did.unittitle:
American Civil Liberties Union--Southern Women's Rights Project
1976-1981
did.origination: American Civil Liberties Union--Southern Women's Rights Project

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box/Folder, American Civil Liberties Union--Southern Women's Rights Project, M 178, Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: The Southern Women's Rights Project (SWRP) located in Richmond is affiliated with the American Civil Liberties Union. The project deals with issues of special concern for women. Topics include: abortion, employment discrimination, ERA, education discrimination, prisoner's rights, children's rights, sexual harrassment, and spouse abuse.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Correspondence with various chapters of the ACLU in Southern states, State ligislation, periodicals, pamphlets, and newspaper clippings.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Files are arranged by subject and chronologically therein.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p: Series VI-(one box of miscellaneous materials)
